meanings.definition: A type of weaving technique using flexible branches or twigs.
meanings.sent1: The basket was beautifully crafted with wickerwork.
meanings.sent2: She learned how to make wickerwork baskets from her grandmother.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to use the wickerwork as a hammock.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a wickerwork of thoughts, weaving together memories and dreams.
meanings.sent5: The intricate wickerwork design on the chair caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: Objects or structures made using this weaving technique.
meanings.sent1: The garden furniture was adorned with delicate wickerwork.
meanings.sent2: The wickerwork on the picnic basket was sturdy and reliable.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat thought the wickerwork was a perfect hiding spot.
meanings.sent4: The wickerwork of society is interconnected, each piece supporting the other.
meanings.sent5: The wickerwork walls of the gazebo let in just the right amount of sunlight.
